item.title: How to Schedule a new Tanzu Tuesdays Episode
item.description: Welcome! If you’re here, it means you’re a willing participant in this zany thing we call Tanzu Tuesdays. You’re probably here to help keep things running smoothly, or perhaps you want to star in your very own episode. Stay tuned and let’s talk through scheduling an Episode. Note: This is not set in stone, if you have a better way to do this, we’re all ears. Just trying to keep things simple and all in one place.
